p: Over the years, the proportion of the negative HI titres was always lower than the base value of 2005 (94.9%). The positive titres showed similar bimodal patterns, with relative minima in 2011, 2015 and 2017. The proportion of the positive titres (≥1:10) peaked in 2010 and 2014. The proportions of positive titres ≥1:20 and ≥1:40 showed an absolute minimum in 2007 and an upsurge in 2008 and 2013, a trend that differed slightly from that of the ≥1:10 positive titres.
